thread.section_title: BlogPress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlogPress | theblogpress.com
thread.title: Debbie

author: Debbie
title: Debbie
text: I had to change my hosting company because they simply did not understand WordPress beginners and I had so many holdups with them. I found the BlogPress to be a very helpful breath of fresh air where they will download things for you on to your blog, have lovely training tutorials plus come back to you very quickly when you get stuck. Good people who completely understand beginners and genuinely want you to succeed.
